smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function getEvent has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function bind appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'OrderCompletedFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Attendee::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["attendees"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Attendee::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["attendees"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Ticket::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["ticket"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Ticket::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["ticket"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)
Parentheses in (price != null && price.equals(0.toFloat())) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: price != null && price.equals(0.toFloat())

Parentheses around the lambda ({ it ->
                    Timber.d("User Fetched")
                    user.value = it
                }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

Parentheses around the lambda ({ user ->
                    Timber.d("Response Success")
                    this.user.value = user
                }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = CASCADE)

Parentheses in (ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ForeignKey(entity = Event::class, parentColumns = ["id"], childColumns = ["event"], onDelete = ForeignKey.CASCADE)
Parentheses in (eventShare.favorite) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: eventShare.favorite
